mapper.insert: INSERT INTO joalib.board(board_title, board_text, board_date, member_id, board_hit) VALUES ( #{board_title}, #{board_text}, #{board_date},#{member_id},0);
mapper.select: select member_pw from joalib.memberinfo where member_id = #{id};
SELECT * FROM joalib.board order by board_no desc;
SELECT count(*) as board_count FROM joalib.board;
mapper.update: UPDATE joalib.board SET board_title =#{board_title}, board_text =#{board_text} WHERE board_no =#{board_no};
UPDATE joalib.board SET board_hit = (board_hit+1) WHERE board_no = #{board_num};
